column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////A must visit if you like coffee
column2: pastries or fresh-squeezed orange juice.  I brought a friend from out of town here since he doesn't ever see any bakeries like this living in the country.  We ordered an iced valrhona mocha
column4: and kouign amman which is like a butter croissant.  We loved everything.  The prices are a little high at first glance
column5: but I look past it either because some of the portions are large
column7: or it just tastes so damn good.  Atmosphere and scenery is another great reason to come.
